org.libgit2.jagged.core

Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libgit2.jagged.core.Platform

  • public class Platform
extends Object
    A Platform represents a given Platform.OperatingSystem and processor Platform.Architecture, useful for identifying the machine you're running on.

        Create a platform from the given Platform.OperatingSystem and Platform.Architecture.

        operatingSystem - the operating system for this platform (not null)
        architecture - the architecture for this platform (not null)
